snippet: Economic officials said they might encourage bank lending but hinted at slower appreciation of the renminbi, which would be a contentious issue for the United States.
abstract: Chinese economic officials say they might encourage bank lending but hint at slower appreciation of the renminbi, which would be a contentious issue for the United States.
lead_paragraph: Economic officials said they might encourage bank lending but hinted at slower appreciation of the renminbi, which would be a contentious issue for the United States.

headline.main: China Talks of More Lending but Less Currency Growth
headline.print_headline: China Talks of More Lending but Less Currency Growth
